name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by chives400, clancine, profbobo, anewcede, Afkpuz, yingkaixing, Wolfslice, SenseiHollywood, trawser, SotiCoto)

name: fuckyoufriday
text: He might have to pray extra just for thinking of something so grotesque.

name: norsef
text: And for not being brave enough to moisten a toasted codgers eyes for them.

name: tekende
text:
"Toasted codger" sounds like an English breakfast food.

"Are you going to eat that toasted codger?"
"Trade you for your blood pudding."
"Right right, jolly good."

name: norsef
text:
Hmm, that is how we talk.
So chubby for that.

name: tekende
text: I probably should have thrown an "I say" in there somewhere too.

name: soticoto
text: Given that codger here is fairly common slang for "old man"... it would be a good trade for a blood pudding.

name: gunsofray
text: chubbied for 'toasted codger'.

name: epicurus
text: I think the no-eyelid moistening one is overkill for bed-wetting. I think God only makes you do that if you accidentally pee in holy water etc.

name: joeyramoney
text: how do you do that accidentally?

name: cousinted
text: Liquor

name: norsef
text: Liquor? I hardly know her!

name: jdhenry105
text:
Kind of how I "accidentally" kissed my buddy's ex-girlfriend the other day.

Sometimes "accidentally" means "it seemed like a good idea at the time."

name: straw
text: And, as cousinted indicated, that's when the liquor comes into the equation.

name: jollysaintpete
text: hah, your buddy saw this and lamed you

name: pa_ass_nts
text: Honest mistake

name: epicurus
text: Very throroughly.

name: boscostacy
text: A comment left by boscostacy was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by pokerface, Thorfinn, yingkaixing)

name: dougthehead
text: Or giving yourself a man-douche using His special wooden bowl.

name: ted0phile
text: I'm not sure how to feel about this comment.

name: dougthehead
text: Ah, that's why you listed your reaction as "neutral."  Having noticed this, I now appreciate your comment enough to feel vaguely "pro" about it.

name: soticoto
text: Aroused?

name: gunsofray
text: I want to man-douche in holy water..

name: xndrew
text: My enjoyment of this little thread about peeing in holy water gives me questions about myself. Bad questions.

name: joeyramoney
text: phillipe is a great distillation of early childhood.

name: gunsofray
text:
Phillipe is five.

.. somebody had to say it.

name: apocowarg
text: alt text "unblinking, they await Phillipe's help" so far the creepiest alt text i've seen.

name: gumfish
text: I thought it was kind of adorable. A level of trust most will never know.

name: farqussus
text: adorable? I'll be peeing MY bed tonight thinking of melt-faced children who can't blinkred eyes leaking, teary goo solidifying on their cheeks, whimpering for mist.

name: pdg
text: That is poetry, man.

name: diggidy
text:
ha ha, whimpering for mist. That image slays me.


Oh my god, I am a terrible person.

name: woodenteeth
text: Whimpering for Mist. I can picture the Hot Topic shirt right now.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: it's got meaning .

name: niggar
text: If he hadn't changed his mind, he would have helped out Zell and Cory .

name: bilingualmonkey
text: Top "alt".

name: charchar
text: Dude, I volunteered at the library last summer.  That is poor bargaining on Phillipe's part because I got to play with balloon animals & glitter-glue.

name: relaxing
text:
this strip is completely devoid of irony.

in a way it is more shocking than any other achewood.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: Sheesh, the imagination on this kid!

name: ravigotte
text: I'm really liking Philippe's "praying face"

name: berami
text: He scares himself so much he has to stop, gasp and second guess himself.  I love how those two pairs of little curved lines manage to make him look so repentant.

name: fattypneumonia
text:
Meet God halfway. Pee in the holy water, THEN use it to mist the eyes of the lidless codgers.

See y'all in hell.

name: garfield
text: As it turns out, burn victims don't really like comedies.

name: badgerzombie
text: that image is never leaving my head. It'll hunt my dreams. Not as sad as the retrded man and the egg.
